Statute.Title: Government Organization Act, 1979 (see Dept. by name)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Organisation du gouvernement, Loi de 1979 sur l’... voir le ministère en cause)

Section.Text: Act (except Part V) in force 02.04.79 see SI/79‑78; Part V in force 01.08.79 see SI/79‑149

CIF.Text: CIF, 1992, c. 1, s. 153 in force on assent 28.02.92
